name: Beyond This Life
description:
===Description===

Your name is Clementine Mairead, a babysitter turned detective following the cold case incident of your brother's murder.  Now, some time later, you end up dead as well. Who killed you? Does it involve your past? You might be a ghost, but you still have a duty to fulfill...

===Controls===

Left Mouse Click - Move / Interact

E - Toggle Inventory (Once Available)

Esc / P - Toggle Pause In-Game

===Credits===

Peter Gomes - Character Concept, Programming, UI Design / Animation

Kiria Bentley - Character / Sprite Design, Character Animation

Katherine Sawyer - Narrative Design, Background / Item Art

===Music Assets Used===

Inquisitive Order - Musictown

Darkest Hour - NaturesEye

Thriller Score Horror Scene - memz

Caves of Dawn - GuilhermeBernades

===SFX Assets Used===

click - 666HeroHero

concrete female heels - LOVEBURD

Unlock Padlock Deadbolt On Door 001 - EdR

Door 2 - Bane Sound

Shocked Sound Effect - Masafumi Takada
